title: Bullets
overview: Tina and Lolo are bold, badass and brave girls who find themselves on a mission to thwart an illegal arms/weapons deal between two countries. On the quest to gather evidence, a mishap occurs and the duo is suddenly up against an influential politician. They soon find themselves being chased not only by his goons but also by the police. Whilst on the run to save themselves from the repercussions of an incident, they are faced with multiple hurdles Will they get arrested, will they get killed or will they be able to complete their mission.
